org.fluidity.deployment.plugin.spi

Interface JarManifest.Dependencies

  • Enclosing interface:
    JarManifest

    public static interface JarManifest.Dependencies
    Handles the dependencies of the host project. JAR manifest handlers receive an instance of this.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attribute(String name, String delimiter)
      Instructs the standalone JAR plugin to include the dependencies of the host project and set the dependency list as the named custom dependency attribute in the manifest.
      Collection<org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact> compiler()
      Returns the compile time dependencies of the host project.
      void include(String name)
      If the handler contains dependencies to included dependencies, it must invoke this method to specify the name under which the dependencies will be found at run time.
      Collection<org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact> runtime()
      Returns the run-time dependencies of the host project.
      boolean unpacked()
      Tells if any dependencies are configured to be unpacked to the root of the archive.

    • Method Detail

      • unpacked

        boolean unpacked()
        Tells if any dependencies are configured to be unpacked to the root of the archive. If the project uses some launcher, the classes that comprise it must be unpacked at the root of the archive. This flag is normally true unless explicitly set to false by the host project.
        Returns:
        true if the archive is configured to have launcher related dependencies unpacked; false otherwise.

      • attribute

        void attribute(String name,
               String delimiter)
        throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Instructs the standalone JAR plugin to include the dependencies of the host project and set the dependency list as the named custom dependency attribute in the manifest.
        Parameters:
        name - the name with which Archives.Nested.dependencies(boolean, String) can find the dependencies at run time.
        delimiter - the delimiter to use to separate the dependency entries.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - when an error occurs.

      • runtime

        Collection<org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact> runtime()
        Returns the run-time dependencies of the host project.
        Returns:
        the run-time dependencies of the host project.

      • compiler

        Collection<org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact> compiler()
        Returns the compile time dependencies of the host project.
        Returns:
        the compile time dependencies of the host project.

      • include

        void include(String name)
      throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        If the handler contains dependencies to included dependencies, it must invoke this method to specify the name under which the dependencies will be found at run time.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to pass to Archives.Nested.attribute(String) at run time to find the included dependencies.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - when an error occurs.
